quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
author: Aristotle

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Success isn’t always about greatness. It’s about consistency.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: A dream doesn’t become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Nothing happens until something moves.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find you working.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
author: John Wooden

quote: Done is better than perfect.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Work hard, have fun, make history.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Work like hell. I mean you just have to put in 80 to 100 hour weeks every week.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Plan your work for today and every day, then work your plan.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
author: Peter T. McIntyre

quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
author: Stephen King

quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
author: Seneca

quote: Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Industry is the soul of business and the keystone of prosperity.
author: Charles Dickens
